channel.title: Frontend Blogs by Harshad
channel.description: Stay updated on modern frontend frameworks and tools.

item.title: SSR vs SSG and the Rise of Disappearing Frameworks in 2025
item.description: Astro, Qwik, and the new wave of frontend frameworks are changing how we think about rendering. Here's what modern developers need to know.

item.title: Salary Trends for Senior Software Engineers in Karnataka: What to Expect in 2025
item.description: Explore the latest salary trends, insights, and what Senior Software Engineers can expect in Karnataka's booming tech market in 2025.

item.title: What MS Dhoni Can Teach Us About Clean UI Design
item.description: MS Dhoni's calm and minimalistic approach on the cricket field offers surprisingly good lessons for frontend developers aiming to build clean and effective UI.
